review: Do not order this!!!!! My husband spent over an hour with tech support trying to make this piece of junk work. We were told that the router had to be within 2.5 feet of the device.  I purchased two of these along with Amazon Prime. When I said I was fed up and I wanted a full refund on both fire sticks and Amazon Prime, which I've had for maybe three weeks, the supervisor said that he would prorate the refund. I said absolutely not and he finally agreed to provide a full refund. A terrible product, misleading and incomplete product info and despicable customer service. I'm through with Amazon. Buyer beware!!!
